alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 8:31AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BAY...CALHOUN AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA THROUGH 930 AM EDT/830 AM CDT/... At 831 AM EDT/731 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Vernon to 7 miles north of Lynn Haven. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moose Pond, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Fountain, Singer Road, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Chipola, Camps Head, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Kinard, Porter Lake, Blountstown Airport, Chipola Park, Vicksburg, Majette, Nixon, and Betts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
